description:
Ravel Token is a blockchain-based digital token that lets you receive and share Hope.Ravel Token’s goal is to give you and your loved ones hope. It is only by hoping for a better future, that we have a chance of creating it.

Ravel Token is a digital-token (asset code RVL) that is built on the Ethereum blockchain. You need a MyEtherwallet to receive, store and share Ravel Token.

The number of Ravel Token is fixed to 1 Billion,  Each token represents an individual person, a digital representation of our own hopes and dreams.

In order to make Ravel Token successful, we aim to be as transparent as possible. Below please find the distribution of Ravel Token.
name: Ravel Token
